data.question: What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ)?
data.answer: Our MOQ starts from 50 packs per product variant. For large-scale buyers such as hotels or distributors, we can adjust accordingly.

data.question: Do you offer custom packaging with our brand?
data.answer: Yes, we provide OEM/white-label services. Minimum volume requirements apply for custom packaging.

data.question: How long is the shelf life of your dimsum products?
data.answer: Our frozen dimsum products can last up to 12 months if stored properly at -18Â°C.

data.question: Do you provide delivery for bulk orders?
data.answer: Yes, we deliver within Jabodetabek with our cold-chain logistics. For outside the region, we can coordinate with third-party delivery services.

data.question: Can I request samples before placing a bulk order?
data.answer: Of course. We provide sample packs so you can test the quality and taste before confirming your order.
